item.title: [Python] Use linter to reduce code review costs
item.description: -**lint**: A program that checks source code more strictly than a compiler or interpreter linter: One that points out the bad part of writing code that gets caught by lint in the editor Code formatter: One that automatically formats code according to lint In software development projects with multiple people, coding conventions may be set in order to improve the quality and reduce the review cost by writing in a unified manner.
